table.name: vtiger_receiptcards
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receiptcards` ( `receiptcardid` int(19) NOT NULL, `receiptcards_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `vendorid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `adoption_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `delivery_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adjustment` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `salescommission` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `exciseduty` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `subtotal` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `total` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `taxtype` varchar(25) DEFAULT '', `discount_percent` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `discount_amount` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `s_h_amount` decimal(29,3) DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` varchar(19) DEFAULT '', `conversion_rate` decimal(14,3) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`receiptcardid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_receiptcardscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receiptcardscf` ( `receiptcardid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`receiptcardid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
